name: Krishna
body: Nice work chetan. all the best for your future. In your bullet points, its taking up the whole width. probably restrict the width to parent element & make it left-aligned, so it will stay in center & will look good. In spotify, you can link to your personal playlist. That way people will understand your taste better. If you want that, that is. Damn! you have read intelligent investor. super!

name: Ravi Kumar
body: Great work overall! Maybe consider adding some more contrast to make it easier on the eyes.

name: Anjali Singh
body: Looks good, but it might be better if you simplify the navigation. It feels a bit cluttered.

body: This looks clean! I'd suggest improving the font size for better readability.

body: Amazing work! Just some minor adjustments with the layout would make it perfect.

body: Nice job! Maybe try adding some animations to make it more dynamic.
